definitions.example: An airplane retracts its wheels for flight.

definitions.definition: To draw back; to draw up.
definitions.example: A cat can retract its claws.

definitions.definition: To take back or withdraw something one has said.
definitions.example: I retract all the accusations I made about the senator and sincerely hope he won't sue me.

definitions.definition: To take back, as a grant or favour previously bestowed; to revoke.
